SYSTEM: GeneralOntologies.pdf: Página 87
Based on Mariano Fernández-López, Asunción Gómez-Pérez and Mª Carmen Suárez Figuereoa’s work 
ORSD 
87 
General ontologies 
1. Conduct a comparative study of 
reusable general ontologies 
Lattices to determine the most appropriate ontology 
Formal concept representing the 
comparative study 
2. Make a decision on which general ontology to reuse 
Choosen a general ontology 
3. Assemble the whole ontology 
Assembled whole ontology
